main.name: Swaroop Chakraborty
main.short_description: I believe in code for good and code for food policy.
main.bio:
Hi there! I am Swaroop! You might also know me as Ayan Chax. I have been into freelancing consulting, coding and full stack development since more than 10 years now. I tend to build scalable mobile ready applications that are interesting for the world and which are essentially useful and helpful to a large section of the community. As a coder, I strongly believe in code for good and code for food policy. I'm a positive team player and an enthusiastic soul at tandem. I have the ability to lead and manage a team to do something brilliantly creative everyday.

Silchar is my hometown and I'm a Bengali(a.k.a Bong) by origin who likes it more when people call me by my pet name, Ayan. I enjoy listening to music, reading books and have an unconditional love for cheese burst pizzas.

Feluda by Satyajit Ray stands top in my all time favorite list when it comes to entertainment. I am a short story writer apart from a curious engineer at work, you may visit the blogs section to read few collection of my short stories.
main.contactmessage: To know more, get in touch with me...

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: M for Muddle is a voluntarily funded start up which provides technical consulting to clients so that they can realize an innovative idea into a product or an app that is brand new in its segment and with endless possibilities.

testimonials.text: Swaroop is a creative, intelligent and 'never say never' person. I worked with him in couple of projects and found him the most dependable engineer. He knows all the tricks and tips of Network, delivers high quality solutions faster than the expectation . I would love to work with him again in future.
Swaroop is one of the top talents in the industry. He has a very strong can-do attitude. A brilliant problem solver and a technical mastermind. Swaroop is the goto guy!!

In my career as developer I have worked with some amazing people, Swaroop is one of them. He has all the good qualities of a great developer and a team player. He is a quick learner, reliable in a fire fighting situation. Have exceptional problem solving skills, an analytical mind and a go getter attitude. A great architect in the making. He would be an asset in any team he works with.
